sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.my-input
  v-text-field(:label="label"
               :placeholder="placeholder"
               @submit="console.log('hi')").input-style
</template>

<script>
import { VTextField } from 'vuetify/lib/components/index.mjs';

export default {
  components: {
    VTextField
  },
  props: {
    placeholder: {
      type: String,
      default: 'FILL ME'
    },
    label: {
      type: String,
      default: 'LABEL ME UP'
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.my-input {
  @include flex-center();

  .input-style {
    margin-top: 150px;
    color: red;
    background-color: white;
    max-width: 250px;
    .v-input__details {
      display: none;
    }
  }
}</style>
